cards.classes: bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 shadow-2xl rounded-xl overflow-hidden relative group

buttons.primary: bg-primary hover:bg-primary/90 text-white font-bold uppercase tracking-wider rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg] px-8 py-3 transition-all hover:skew-x-[-15deg]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 hover:border-white/50 text-white uppercase tracking-wider rounded-none px-6 py-3

navigation.classes: fixed bottom-8 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-full px-6 py-3 flex gap-6 shadow-2xl z-50

visual_enhancers.textures: bg-[url('https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg')] opacity-20 mix-blend-overlay fixed inset-0 pointer-events-none z-0

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4, ease: 'easeOut' }}
motion.loading_sequence: Staggered reveal of logo parts, followed by a 'light speed' expansion to the dashboard.

elite_players.layout: Horizontal Scroll / Carousel with 3D Tilt effect on cards

standings.layout: Split View: Grand Central Conference (Left) vs Ridge Conference (Right)

playoffs.feature: Interactive Bracket with connecting lines that glow on hover. Use SVG for lines.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
